name: Multidimensional CHESS
description:
A new way of playing chess, with two dimensions more than normal.

Characters

Shield Guy

  • Movement: Move on a straight line, always on the same dimension
  • Attack: Can attack on the diagonals  on adjacent squares
  • 5 damage / 15 health

Horse Like

  • Movement: Move between dimensions on a 'L' shape
  • Attack: Can attack on all adjacent squares
  • 15 damage / 10 health

Spear Guy

  • Movement: Move on the diagonals all the way through, can also change dimensions between the squares on the same position
  • Attack: Can attack on a straight line all the way through
  • 10 damage / 5 health

King

  • 30 health
Rules
  • Game ends when only remains Shield Guys on either of the teams, or one of the kings die.
  • When two pieces collide only remains the piece with higher health, the other one receive the damage of the  other one's health.
Bare in mind

this web version is not the ideal way to play this game, it has some errors that does not take place on desktop builds
